title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 11, ch. I, pt. 3 - Election Of Directors In Domestic Life Insurance Companies
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 11, ch. I, pt. 3 - Election Of Directors In Domestic Life Insurance Companies

State Regulations
§ 3.1 - Notice of policyholder's right to vote
§ 3.2 - Publication of administration candidates
§ 3.3 - Company's option as to more extensive notice
§ 3.4 - Procedure for election of directors or trustees where an independent ticket has not been filed

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. tit. 11, ch. I, pt. 3

Statutory authority: Insurance Law, §§301, 4210

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
